lead_paragraph: Richard Lapchick, the son of the Hall of Fame coach Joe Lapchick, has spent nearly his entire life supporting diversity and equality in sports.
snippet: Richard Lapchick, the son of the Hall of Fame coach Joe Lapchick, has spent nearly his entire life supporting diversity and equality in sports.
